snippet: Celebrating Benjamin Britten’s centenary, Juilliard’s annual Songfest program focused on his songs Tuesday night at Alice Tully Hall.
abstract: Zachary Woolfe reviews performances in Juilliard School's annual Songfest program at Alice Tully Hall.
lead_paragraph: Celebrating Benjamin Britten’s centenary, Juilliard’s annual Songfest program focused on his songs Tuesday night at Alice Tully Hall.

headline.seo: Britten in Juilliard’s Spotlight at Alice Tully Hall
headline.main: Big Composer on Campus: A Vocal Tribute to That Curriculum Mainstay, Britten
headline.print_headline: Big Composer on Campus: A Vocal Tribute to That Curriculum Mainstay, Britten
